column4: I was able to fix it, now I can get going, but still no sound other then on the net
when I did the fist step in that fix, it said that esd wasn't on the system, yet I know it is
those went fine
thank god for the backup, thats what allowed me to get back in
after I put my username and pass in it would freeze unless I hit ctrl-alt F6 and did a killall esd
correct
looked around the boards and mine is totally different
for example, my son likes to play games on nick.com, the games he plays the sound works, I can play cd's with no problems too
i just don't have any system sounds without locking up the system or constantly hearing the question.wav from the greeter
I take it you tried the "fix sound" howto on http://ubuntuguide.org ?
I disabled sound server startup for gnome as well
ah, disable it again then
then use oss or alsa as output in bmp, xmms etc
no, if you followed the howto you should now have dmix enabled
I use gstreamer with rhythmbox, and OSS with beep
was that for me?
yes, sorry
just type ` which esd ` ina terminal and post the output
Ok so it's installed, obviously
sorry that was for you
I doubt it's anthing to do with your card
